content.rendered:
Photo via Gratisography

This Week in Genesis you’ve all knocked me over with all the awesome you’ve been putting out there, but I’ve done my best to cover it all including gorgeous new theme previews, a new Genesis plugin and some exciting news on the Genesis Translation plugin.

Themes

Frank at WP Studio, one of my favourite theme shops, is playing around with ideas for a new theme.

Having fun working out ideas for a new WordPress Genesis theme… #WordPress #GenesisWP #wordpresstheme pic.twitter.com/EOlEavfE20

— WPStudio (@wpstudiowp) March 8, 2017

Jesse Petersen is on the verge of launching a new blogging theme for his GenesisThe.me project.

My theme shop is about to get bigger… our first mobile-first #genesiswp blogging theme coming this week. @_GenesisTheme pic.twitter.com/RGUBXAjTBZ

— Jesse Ⓦ Petersen (@jpetersen) March 7, 2017

That buzz you get when you’re on the verge of releasing a new #genesiswp theme… pic.twitter.com/8vxTjDVTcG

— Jesse Ⓦ Petersen (@jpetersen) March 6, 2017

SEO Themes is working on (another) new theme, Restaurant Pro.

Working on a new theme! Restaurant Pro Genesis Child Theme by @seothemeswp: https://t.co/ez2kuo9I14 #genesiswp # WordPress

— Seo Themes (@seothemeswp) March 8, 2017

Full size preview of the upcoming Restaurant Pro Genesis theme: https://t.co/7Xoymx2B6i #WordPress #genesiswp 😀

— Seo Themes (@seothemeswp) March 8, 2017

There’s now a free version of the GBeaver theme.

Now you can download the free version of GBEAVER #genesiswp + @BeaverBuilder compatible theme from https://t.co/XYFedlWOZ5 #pagebuilder

— Beaver World (@wpbeaverworld) March 9, 2017

Showcase

Pilcrow Pixel with an stunning refresh of jamesmorganfilms.com

Just gone live with a refreshed look for https://t.co/avLYqqtF4S, a site first launched last year. #genesiswp #WordPress

— Pilcrow + Pixel (@PilcrowPixel) March 6, 2017

Stephanie Hellwig with a beautiful site for drbeckycampbell.com

New design for @DrBeckyCampbell on @studiopress sites using a @restored316 #WordPress theme #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/IYhVcbTQjd

— Stephanie Hellwig (@stephanehellwig) March 7, 2017

Tony Eppright with an eye-catching site for hollywhittlef.com

Latest #genesiswp website, beautifully designed by (and for) https://t.co/X94BIKUhgA dev by @_AlphaBlossom pic.twitter.com/8EbdZlDM8N

— Tony Eppright (@_AlphaBlossom) March 9, 2017

Gordon Seirup for wildrockpr.com

@studiopress We just launched another #wordpress site with fully custom #childtheme on the #genesiswp framework: https://t.co/5powvikWBd

— Gordon Seirup (@CopperGordon) March 9, 2017

Tara Claeys with a new Genesis and Beaver Builder powered site for dachadc.com

Dacha Beer Garden & Cafe

And congrats to Doug on launch his first Genesis website, compoundingclarity.com

Proud to launch my first #genesiswp site. Thanks to everyone who helped and convinced me to start with Genesis.https://t.co/r3fVJ5Jc4m pic.twitter.com/j7RnCD6V3J

— Doug Harper (@endodoug) March 7, 2017

Best of the rest

Not content with theme teases (see above), WP Studio releases a cool new Genesis Countdown plugin.

I am proud to announce my latest #genesiswp plugin. This plugin adds a Countdown to your Genesis Theme. https://t.co/fzWoijJv1q pic.twitter.com/NIMNfFmqk0

— WPStudio (@wpstudiowp) March 6, 2017

Remkus de Vries with some exciting news on the Genesis Translations plugin.

I just sent out an email about the #genesiswp Translation plugin, but you may want to know this as well https://t.co/b0YH8ed3i3

— Remkus de Vries (@DeFries) March 6, 2017

Sridhar Katakam shows you how to add a ‘NEW’ label for posts published in the last x number of days in Genesis.

Adding a NEW label for Posts published in the last x number of days in Genesis:https://t.co/MRqm18BV2o#GenesisWP pic.twitter.com/2Io4FyoRGA

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) March 10, 2017

Alan Smith on how to make a toggle FAQ similar to the current one on StudioPress.

How to create a toggle FAQ like the one on @StudioPress. Simple tutorial with code. #genesiswp #WordPress https://t.co/KfiJd5dRTE pic.twitter.com/QtoCdsVRzA

— Alan Smith (@Media317) March 8, 2017

Leslie Bernal shows you how to style a transparent Caldera Form on your Genesis site.

Styling a Transparent Caldera Form on Your Genesis Site https://t.co/V1LbVhdfij by @agirlandhermac via @CalderaWP #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/wl3Wryj9By

— Josh Pollock (@Josh412) March 6, 2017

Huge congrats to Tonya Mork on the one year anniversary of Know The Code, it’s a fantastic resource and I can’t wait for the next 12 months (and beyond).

Today is @KnowTheCodePro's 1yr Code-a-versary. Thank you #WordPress and #genesiswp! Man, I love this Community! #WordPressRocks!

— Tonya Mork (@hellofromTonya) March 9, 2017

Brian Gardner rocked another StudioPress Live over on Facebook Live. This time around it was an open mic with questions on all kinds of topics.

If you missed it though you can still catch the replay and make sure to get your questions in for next time!

Join @bgardner today at 1:00 CST for StudioPress Live on Facebook. Today’s topic: Everything Goes — https://t.co/orgsCqsQAU #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/IWiI7fAm6u

— StudioPress (@studiopress) March 9, 2017

And finally

Preach Dan, preach…

Said it before, will say it again: You really appreciate how much thought goes into Genesis when working on a site without it. #genesiswp

— Dan Rippon (@danrippon) March 6, 2017

—

That’s all for this week.

Got some awesome to share? Go add it!. Want to support what I’m doing? Go subscribe.

Till next time!

excerpt.rendered: Gorgeous new theme previews, a new Genesis plugin and some exciting news on the Genesis Translation plugin.
